description: This file contains implementation of backend APIs for logging functionality within a COSA data model, including creation, initialization, and removal of logging objects, as well as handling internal logging configurations.

classes.name: COSA_DATAMODEL_LOGGING
classes.description: Data structure representing the logging object in the COSA data model.

classes.name: COSA_DML_LOGGING
classes.description: Structure holding the logging configuration data.

classes.name: COSA_DML_LOGGING_CONFIG
classes.description: Structure detailing the specific logging configuration parameters.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE CosaLoggingCreate(VOID)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new logging object, returning a handle to it.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaLoggingInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the logging object, allocating and populating configuration data.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaLoggingRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Frees the memory allocated for the logging object and its configuration.
